text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service degradation: Increased API Errors and Latencies>
We are investigating increased API error rates when establishing new connections to AWS IoT Core in the EU-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Errors and Latencies>
Between 1:52 AM and 3:35 AM PDT we experienced increased API error rates and latencies in the EU-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Authentication Availability>
We are investigating availability issues with authenticating using Active Directory in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Authentication Availability>
Between 6:30 PM and 9:10 PM PDT we experienced increased Active Directory authentication failures in the US-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
